Magic Items.name: Magic Items
Magic Items.text:
@UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-hare-raising.Item.TGlDzLlSsHq9vLLp]{Arm of the Grey Knight}

@Embed[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-hare-raising.Item.STIHR6cr5UK6CcA1 inline]{Arm of the Grey Knight (Uncommon)}

Rare variant: The arm can crawl on walls and ceilings and is capable of wielding a longsword Increase the attack bonus to +7, the damage to 1d6 + 5 (or 1d8 + 5 if it’s wielding a longsword), the speed reduction to 20 feet, and the DCs to 15.

  • @UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-hare-raising.Item.TGlDzLlSsHq9vLLp]{Arm of the Black Knight (Uncommon)}

  • @UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-hare-raising.Item.STIHR6cr5UK6CcA1]{Arm of the Black Knight (Rare)}

@UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-hare-raising.Item.Mm3fqYckPTxDj9Hw]{Coconut of Alacrity}

@Embed[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-hare-raising.Item.Mm3fqYckPTxDj9Hw inline]{Coconut of Alacrity)}

@UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-hare-raising.Item.VXCFlF13jnBOvoMg]{Osseous Spike}

@Embed[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-hare-raising.Item.VXCFlF13jnBOvoMg inline]{Osseous Spike (Rare)}

Very rare variant: Increase the DCs to 16, the charges to 4, and the recharge to 1d4 The item has the Crippling Impalement property.

  • Crippling Impalement. As an action while holding this lance, you can cause its shadowy hands to extend and try to grab a creature that you can see within 20 feet of you, forcing it to make a DC 16 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is seized by the hands, pulled to within 5 feet of you, and has an arm or leg (your choice) skewered by the lance, taking 6d4 piercing damage The shadowy hands then release the creature. Until the end of its next turn, the creature has &reference[disadvantage]{disadvantage} on attack rolls made with the use of its arms if you skewered its arm, or has its speed reduced to 0 feet if you skewered its leg. Once this property of the lance has been used, it can’t be used again until the next dawn.

  • @UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-hare-raising.Item.VXCFlF13jnBOvoMg]{Osseous Spike (Rare)}

  • @UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-hare-raising.Item.4JbskzKN3WIZrgRO]{Osseous Spike (Very Rare)}

@UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-hare-raising.Item.ZBUJV13KHI8lucXg]{Robes of the Enchanter}

@Embed[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-hare-raising.Item.ZBUJV13KHI8lucXg inline]{Robes of the Enchanter (Uncommon)}

Rare variant: Increase the DC to 15. The item has the Explosive Step property.

  • Explosive Step. While wearing these robes, you can cast the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.wqfAVANuQonNBgnL]{misty step} spell. When you do, you can create an explosion as per the Spontaneous Detonation property, either in the space you leave or the space you arrive at You automatically succeed on the saving throw against it. Once this property of the robes has been used, it can’t be used again until the next dawn.

  • @UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-hare-raising.Item.ZBUJV13KHI8lucXg]{Robes of the Enchanter (Uncommon)}

  • @UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-hare-raising.Item.E4BrHXP2kTJLLAEw]{Robes of the Enchanter (Rare)}

@UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-hare-raising.Item.UIY3SECt4fqA0fRk]{Somewhat Holy Hand Grenade}

@Embed[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-hare-raising.Item.UIY3SECt4fqA0fRk inline]{Somewhat Holy Hand Grenade}

@UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-hare-raising.Item.QgsERWFF5DzGZFat]{The Longsword in the Stone}

@Embed[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-hare-raising.Item.QgsERWFF5DzGZFat inline]{The Longsword in the Stone (Uncommon)}

Legendary variant: The sword deals its normal damage type, and deals an extra 1d6 radiant damage to each target it hits, instead of bludgeoning damage to the first target it hits on each of your turns. Instead of the Moderate Executive Power property, the item has the Supreme Executive Power property and the Conjure Watery Tart property. The sword is called the Sword out of the Stone instead of the Sword in the Stone.

  • Supreme Executive Power. As the owner of the mighty sword, you command respect and obedience beyond compare, and no authority is higher than yours. While carrying the sword, you have &reference[advantage]{advantage} on Charisma (Persuasion) checks, Charisma saving throws, and saving throws made against spells of the Enchantment school of magic.

  • Conjure Watery Tart. While holding this sword, you can cast the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.1LkZvINag7KqBmDR]{Conjure Elemental} spell (water elemental only). The elemental takes the shape of an elegant woman, and if your concentration on the spell is broken, it doesn’t turn hostile toward you and your companions, but instead spends the remainder of the spell’s duration following and berating you for perceived misuses of power. Once this property of the sword has been used, it can’t be used again until the next dawn.

  • @UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-hare-raising.Item.QgsERWFF5DzGZFat]{The Longsword in the Stone (Uncommon)}

  • @UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-hare-raising.Item.FloTsrLNDvmhPCcJ]{The Longsword out of the Stone (Legendary)}

  • @UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-hare-raising.Item.hzQbHjqUez9EMqOE]{The Greatsword in the Stone (Uncommon)}

  • @UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-hare-raising.Item.1vfQ9TestNMkxe4N]{The Greatsword out of the Stone (Legendary)}

  • @UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-hare-raising.Item.sz1z5r5Wx2hQ6ms9]{The Rapier in the Stone (Uncommon)}

  • @UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-hare-raising.Item.HGOYOiDYOTsOgAB3]{The Rapier out of the Stone (Legendary)}

  • @UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-hare-raising.Item.Z7JnzHL4fxcKUDDM]{The Scimitar in the Stone (Uncommon)}

  • @UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-hare-raising.Item.J2nBSMxVqolGqKqL]{The Scimitar out of the Stone (Legendary)}

  • @UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-hare-raising.Item.wcr6pAGyrRfdT7mN]{The Shortsword in the Stone (Uncommon)}

  • @UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-hare-raising.Item.lkPjhhaeLmmgr4DD]{The Shortsword out of the Stone (Legendary)}

Sounds.name: Sounds
Sounds.text:
Did you hear that twig break? I swear I just heard a kobold chittering Was that a vat of boiling Mut-x or are you hungry?

Fresh from the College of Ambience is the bard, Michaël Ghelfi, who’s created a wonderful catalogue of ambiences for each monster hunt Immerse your senses in these vibrant, layered soundscapes as you track, hunt, and harvest!

You can find the ambiences by clicking or typing the URL below.

heliana.lt/ambiences
